articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Masik Pass Skiing Ground
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Masik Pass Skiing Ground
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to the Masik  Pass Skiing Ground now under construction by the KPA.
					He mounted an observation deck to hear a detailed report on the construction of the skiing ground.
					
					He was greatly satisfied to learn that soldier-builders have constructed a skiing area on mountain ranges covering hundreds of thousands of square meters, including primary, intermediate and advanced courses with almost 110 000 meters in total length and 40-120 meters in width. 
					
					He said the skiing ground is located in the best place as it ensures a long period of skiing and it is easy to have access to it with the Pyongyang-Wonsan tourist motorway available nearby.
					
					He learned about progress made in the construction of objects such as skiing gatepost, hotel, skiing apparatuses storehouse, heliport and cableway. He climbed the peak of the skiing ground more than 1 360 meters above the sea level.
					
					Making a bird's-eye view of the skiing ground, he said it is nice to see it, but it would be more fantastic to watch the ground covered with snow.
					
					He indicated tasks and ways for hastening the construction of the skiing ground.
					
					He noted that it is the firm determination of the Party to build the skiing ground into a world class one.
					
					He called on the soldier-builders to accelerate the construction so that the skiing ground may go operational from the coming winter.
					
					He gave instructions to properly build a drainage system to prevent the courses from being washed away by rain in the rainy season and plant turf of good species suitable for that area so as to keep the courses in good shape even after thaw.
					
					He said it is necessary to build well not only rest places but first- aid stations at starting, middle and final points of the courses and establish an automatic cableway monitoring system for a real time watch so as to take measures to prevent accidents.
					
					He underlined the need to preserve ecological environment and prevent pollution while building the skiing ground. 
					
					He called for properly setting up a unit for operating the ground and scrupulously organizing its management from now while pushing ahead with the construction, and taking measures for the production of skis and other winter sports apparatuses.
					
					He called on the relevant field to supply equipment and materials needed for construction in a responsible manner and pay deep attention to this work.
					
					He was accompanied with Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Pak Jong Chon and So Hong Chan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at Closed U.S., Japan, S. Korea Joint Military Drill
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at Closed U.S., Japan, S. Korea Joint Military Drill
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S., Japan and south Korea recently staged closed joint military exercise in the waters west of Kyushu, Japan.
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					The exercise is the manifestation of the U.S. sinister intention to hold military supremacy in the region by establishing triangular military alliance for aggression through sustained escalation of the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					It was originally planned to be staged as an open military drill involving the U.S. and the Japanese Maritime "Self-Defense Force", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					As the south Korean puppet army, whose participation was thought to be impossible, took part in the exercise, the U.S. announced that it would keep the exercise from being opened to the public.
					
					This proves that it seeks a sinister aim in the drill.
					
					While being bent on the frantic exercise, the U.S. called for "escalating pressure" on the DPRK.
					
					This testifies to the fact that hostile forces' alleged drills for search and rescue operations for humanitarian purposes are no more than a military blackmail prompted by their foolish design to derail the DPRK's new strategic line on simultaneously advancing the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					The disturbing movement of the U.S. for military supremacy in Asia-Pacific arouses due vigilance of regional countries.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK consider the recent military drill as a poor rowdyism of those who were upset by the daily growing national capability of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Aim in Building MD System
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Aim in Building MD System
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Missile defense (MD) system being established by the U.S. is not aimed to "protect" itself and its allied states from the "threat" from someone.
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					The U.S. is pushing ahead with it under the pretext of the "threat" from the DPRK, the article notes, and goes:
					
					The aim sought by the U.S. is to increase military threat to the DPRK and stifle it by keeping its strategic deterrence at bay with missiles at any time.
					
					It also seeks to make the "threat" from the DPRK an established fact and thus justify the establishment of a missile shield for world domination.
					
					The U.S. is building the MD system with an eye to compress big powers in Asia-Pacific from the east and the west.
					
					Such moves are sparking a fresh arms race worldwide and its stepped-up weaponization of outer space is gravely threatening the existence of humankind.
					
					The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula urgently requires the DPRK to increase its self-defence capability in every way.
					
					The DPRK does not hide that its development of missiles is to achieve a final victory in the over-all confrontation with the U.S.
					
					With no rhetoric can the U.S. warmongers justify their acts of gravely threatening the DPRK by force of arms and shifting the blame for it on to the DPRK, a victim.
					
					The U.S. had better stop such a foolish attempt at attaining its strategic goal under the pretext of "missile threat" from the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Koreans' Rights Can Not Be Guaranteed under U.S. Rule: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Koreans' Rights Can Not Be Guaranteed under U.S. Rule: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- South Korea is now increasingly turning into the world's worst theater of human rights abuses and fascist suppression. This is unthinkable without the U.S. colonial rule over south Korea.
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					The whole south Korea is the U.S. imperialists' colony, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					South Korea is totally dependent on the U.S. in politics, economy, military affairs and all other fields and its ruling quarters are following the U.S. policy in every step and moving at the instructions and under the backstage manipulation of the U.S.
					
					South Koreans' desire for democracy was ruthlessly dampened by the U.S. moves to maintain colonial rule in south Korea, which is being derided as the world biggest barren land of human rights.
					
					The puppet regime is keen on dictatorship and suppression in a bid to cook people's goose for independence, democracy and reunification while serving the U.S. in its policy for colonial domination.
					
					The puppet ruling quarters are maintaining their pro-American dictatorial regime under the patronage of the U.S., violating the people's democratic freedom and rights. This is being led to an action for reviving "yusin" dictatorship under the present regime.
					
					All facts go to prove that human rights can never be ensured without sovereignty.
					
					Outsiders' domination can not go with the independent rights of the popular masses.
					
					South Koreans' democratic rights can never be guaranteed under the U.S. colonial rule.

articles.title: An Elderly Killed by S. Korean Warmongers' War Drill
articles.content:
An Elderly Killed by S. Korean Warmongers' War Drill
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- An old person, aged 65, met a grievous death in the area around the shooting range of a unit of the south Korean puppet forces in Myongwol-ri of Sanae-myon in Hwachon County, south Korean Kangwon Province, according to south Korean KBS.
					It was reported that the aged who left his home to dig up edible wild vegetables on May 22 was found dead the next day and there was a wound caused by a shell fragment in his body.
					
					The puppet military unit frantically staged a live shell firing drill by mortars in the shooting range the day the deceased left home.
					
					The south Korean people are living in pains almost every day with their lives being exposed to the threat from time to time due to the puppet warmongers' madcap war maneuvers to invade the north.

articles.title: Truth about Spy Case in 1970s Revealed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Truth about Spy Case in 1970s Revealed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Truth behind a spy case cooked up under the "yusin" fascist dictatorial rule was disclosed in south Korea.
					On May 22, the court authorities of south Korea delivered the verdict of not-guilty upon Kim Jong Sa and Ryu Song Sam, Koreans in Japan who were prosecuted on spy charges when they were studying in south Korea in the 1970s.
					
					The then puppet Defence Security Command illegally took them away and practiced all kinds of tortures against them for nearly a month, forcing them into confession of passing a military secret to an operative belonging to an organization of Koreans in Japan embraced by the north.
					
					Based on this, the fascist authorities cooked up a spy case and sentenced the indictees to 10 years in prison in June, 1978.
					
					The authorities made no scruple of linking core democratic figures to those students and sentencing them to death on charges of plotting internal disturbances.
					
					In November 2009 the south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation and other bodies argued that those victims were taken away against law and forced into confession and asserted that their crimes are not acknowledgeable.
					
					The victims, therefore, filed a lawsuit which resulted in the recent court judgment of not-guilty on them.

articles.title: Women's Society in Japan Censures Reckless Remarks of Co-head of Japan Restoration Party
articles.content:
Women's Society in Japan Censures Reckless Remarks of Co-head of Japan Restoration Party
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Democratic Women's Society in Japan released a statement on May 19 in protest against a Japanese ultra-right element who made reckless remarks justifying the past sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					On May 13 Hashimoto, co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, insisted on the "necessity" for the past Japanese army's system for sexual slavery and made reckless remarks justifying the war crimes perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists, the statement charged, adding that he did not hesitate to let loose a string of balderdash that Japan is unreasonably insulted as regards the issue of the sexual slavery.
					
					The die-hard chauvinist Hashimoto's denial of Japan's aggression-woven history and reckless remarks of distorting history are nothing but a serious violation of human rights of those women who were taken to the battlefields of the Japanese army as sexual slaves and an insult to all who had fallen victim to Japan's wars for aggression, it noted.
					
					It is the stark historical facts that the Japanese imperialists enforced the national discrimination and committed the crimes of the sexual slavery during their occupation of Korea and under their colonial rule over it. However, he distorted the essence of the issue, an indication that he has no qualifications as a politician.
					
					The statement urged Hashimoto to immediately retract his reckless remarks and make a sincere apology.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S., S. Korea Slammed by Romanian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S., S. Korea Slammed by Romanian Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, released a statement on May 20 denouncing the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to stifle the DPRK.
					He mentioned as follows:
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean authorities staged again threat-posing and offensive large marine drills with the involvement of the nuclear-powered aircraft-carrier strike force in the East Sea of Korea on May 11.
					
					The drills just clearly proved that the U.S. is the very one harassing the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Such brigandish logic that they can wage any military provocation against the DPRK and the latter is not allowed to defend itself can never work on the Korean people.
					
					The U.S. should not underestimate the strength of the Korean people who are closely united around their leaders and had access to powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					The Socialist Party of Romania hopes that the Korean people would register bigger success in their efforts to bolster the country's defence capabilities and step up economic construction, true to the new strategic line on simultaneously advancing economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The world justice-loving and fair-minded people will always stand by the Korean people.

articles.title: Indian Paper Supports Korean People's Efforts to Defend Sovereignty
articles.content:
Indian Paper Supports Korean People's Efforts to Defend Sovereignty
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Indian paper People's Democracy carried an article titled "The U.S. threat to Asia can not be overlooked" contributed by Suneet Chopra, secretary general of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association who is a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), on April 28.
					The U.S. does not give up its strategy of strangling the DPRK, despite its repeated defeats during the past more than half a century, the article said, and went on:
					
					The U.S. line is to help Japan rearm and south Korea realize its ambition for nuclear armament.
					
					It introduces its cutting-edge weapons into areas of the Korean Peninsula. Such development of the situation is ascribable to the U.S. tactics, not the "threat from the DPRK".
					
					The U.S. and its satellite forces dare not provoke the Korean people who have turned out to defend the sovereignty.
					
					This is evidenced with added clarity by the recent events.
					
					The U.S. failed to implement its commitment to build light water reactors for the DPRK, compelling the latter to take such measure as restarting the idled nuclear reactor.
					
					This clearly shows that the DPRK's nuclear facility is being used for peaceful purposes.
					
					However, the U.S. totally ignores such stark fact.
					
					Serious is that it cooked up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, taking issue with its legitimate satellite launch in last December.
					
					This is, in fact, the undisguised hostile act against the DPRK and threat to the peace of not only East Asia but the world.
					
					It is a lesson drawn from the present situation that Asian countries should unite and stand up against the U.S. threat.
					
					The experience gained by the DPRK is very precious and essential for us in coping with the U.S. double-standard moves, concluded the article.

articles.title: Nigerian Personage Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats
articles.content:
Nigerian Personage Praises Kim Il Sung's Feats
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, gave a lecture at University of Abuja on May 20 after taking part in the African regional seminar on "The Juche Idea and Lesson for Independent Reform of Africa."
					Saying the seminar discussed the issue of realizing economic prosperity through collective self-reliance of the continent by embodying the Juche idea in the actual practice of Africa, the issue of achieving solidarity and unity among African countries to cope with the moves of the West and other issues, he introduced in detail about the whole course of the seminar.
					
					The chairman recalled that participants of seminar heard the voices of the progressives praising President Kim Il Sung, founder of the great Juche idea, adding:
					
					The President performed undying feats before the times and history, holding aloft the banner of independence.
					
					He founded the Juche idea in the early period of his revolutionary activities and dedicated everything to the global independence.
					
					He also rendered sincere help to developing countries in their cause for independence against imperialism.
					
					Thanks to his positive support and encouragement the people in the African countries which were once called a colonial continent could make a great progress in their struggle for achieving independence and building a new society.
					
					The banner of independence held aloft by the President serves as a motive force propelling the Korean people in their drive to register signal achievements without let-up in the on-going socialist construction and the progressive people in their struggle to achieve independence of the whole world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Base de Abastecimiento de Costa Oriental de Unidad 639 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Base de Abastecimiento de Costa Oriental de Unidad 639 de EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Base de Abastecimiento de Costa Oriental adscrita a la Unidad 639 del EPC.
					El Mariscal vio los caquis que los jefes y empleados de la base guardaban bien desde el comienzo del invierno de 2011 con ilimitada anoranza hacia el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Escucho las poesias creadas por los empleados, que reflejan ardiente sentimiento de anoranza al Dirigente.
					
					Acto seguido, recorrio el bano, el comedor, la sala de descanso, el almacen refrigerador y otros lugares, donde se cercioro en detalles de las actividades de gestion y metodos de administracion empresarial.
					
					Senalo que esta empresa da ayuda al Comandante Supremo diciendo que tambien el ano pasado, en pleno acato al proposito del Comandante Supremo, capturo muchos peces y los suministro a los militares de la unidad y otros habitantes.
					
					Al informarse de que la llave de tal exito esta en haber puesto de pleno manifiesto la fuerza espiritual de los empleados, elevado el nivel cientifico de la pesca prestando atencion a la intendencia, reducido el tiempo de anclaje de barcos pesqueros y acondicionado bien la base de reparacion de barcos, insistio en que deben hacer que otras bases pesqueras aprendan la manera de trabajo y las experiencias de los funcionarios de dicha base.
					
					Luego, el Comandante Supremo recorrio la base de reparacion de barcos. 
					
					Se mostro satisfecho al hacer conocimiento de las propiedades tecnicas del detector de cardumenes vertical y horizontal de alta eficiencia, dotado en el barco pesquero de 200 HP, y del uso de calor residual de los barcos pesqueros. 
					
					Tambien quedo regocijado de que los barcos pesqueros no se reparan despues de deteriorarse, sino llevan siempre el motor de repuesto para reemplazarlo en un corto tiempo. 
					
					El Mariscal se reunio con un matrimonio de torneros que trabajan juntos y aprecio sus esfuerzos. 
					
					El volvio a evaluar los exitos alcanzados por esta empresa calificandola de modelo de todo el ejercito y dio agradecimiento en nombre del Comite Central del PTC. 
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los comandantes, militares y empleados de la Base de Abastecimiento de Costa Oriental de la Unidad 639 del EPC serviran mejor para la patria y el pueblo, dio como recuerdo a la subunidad directa el binoculo, el fusil automatico y la ametralladora y tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con ellos. 
					
					En esta ocasion le acompanaron Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Pak Jong Chon y So Hong Chan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Combinado de Elaboracion Alimentaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Combinado de Elaboracion Alimentaria
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Combinado de Elaboracion Alimentaria adscrito a la Unidad 534 del EPC.
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el panorama de la fabrica y recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionario y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					El Mariscal recordo con emocion las proezas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien propuso la reconstruccion del Combinado para suministrar a los militares mucho mas alimentos procesados incluidos los alimentos basicos y dio valiosas instrucciones visitandola en varias ocasiones desde los momentos algidos de construccion.
					
					Paso revista a la sala de mando general, la de lectura electronica y las de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					Acto seguido, estuvo en varios puntos como el taller de alimentos basicos y el de arroz cocido inmediato haciendo conocimiento detallado de la normalizacion de produccion. 
					
					Realizar la automatizacion en las fabricas alimentarias es la demanda indispensable para garantizar en lo higienico los alimentos, apunto.
					
					Viendo varios alimentos procesados en el Combinado, dio las instrucciones preciosas para normalizar la produccion y elevar su calidad.
					
					El abastecimiento es la campana de defensa del socialismo, recalco y subrayo que el Combinado y otras plantas alimentarias estan al frente de la intendencia, o sea, la campana de defensa del socialismo. 
					
					Destaco que los empleados del Combinado deben tener siempre presente que estan junto a los militares en la trinchera del combate de defensa de socialismo.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal dio las tareas de reconstruirlo  modernamente conforme a las alturas de la era del Songun y tomo las medidas necesarias. 
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros del Combinado cumpliran satisfactoriamente con su honrosa mision asumida y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					En esta ocasion le acompanaron Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Pak Jong Chon y So Hong Chan.

articles.title: RPDC observara el movimiento posterior de gobernante surcoreana, declara DP de CDN de RPDC
articles.content:
RPDC observara el movimiento posterior de gobernante surcoreana, declara DP de CDN de RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 25 la siguiente declaracion:
					El 23 de mayo, la presidenta titere del Sur de Corea, Park Geun-hye, volvio a mostrar abiertamente la malsana intencion conflictiva anti-RPDC.
					
					En una audiencia sostenida aquel dia con la comitiva del jefe del "Instituto de Asuntos Estrategicos" de Estados Unidos, Park dijo con aduloneria que la RPDC ha venido haciendo un "juego" que agudiza la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y ahora pretende un nuevo "juego" llamado la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas.
					
					Y al censurar directamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, solto los disparates atrevidos de que no se alcanzara la meta de la linea mencionada y actuo con absurdidad para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la agravacion de la situacion general de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					No es la primera vez tal disparate tan imprudente de Park.
					
					Desde  aquellos momentos en que se desesperaba desvergonzadamente por ocupar el trono presidencial, Park vino recurriendo a la campana conflictiva insultando gravemente a la RPDC con las palabras socarronas y absurdas. 
					
					Estando insatisfecha con la escena politica surcoreana deshonrada y sin saber nada de la opinion publica interna y externa, armo la campana conflictiva durante su reciente visita a Estados Unidos en connivencia con ese amo gringo. 
					
					Puesto que se ha revelado completamente la naturaleza conflictiva de Park, nos vimos obligados a cuestionarla.
					
					El ignorante debe ser callado, porque puede revelar su ignorancia y sufrir las desgracias inesperadas.
					
					En cuanto a la linea sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, que calumnio atrevidamente Park, es la gran continuacion a una etapa mas elevada de la linea sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de la defensa nacional, presentada en la decada de los 60 del siglo pasado para hacer frente a la situacion severa de aquel entonces. 
					
					La hemos desarrollado de acuerdo con la demanda de la crisis actual a punto de la guerra, creada por EE.UU.
					
					Con esta linea, que no puede presentar ningun pais, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos estan levantando un paraiso socialista y la RPDC ostenta el gallardo aspecto de la potencia ideo-politica y militar con armas nucleares, admirada, envidiada y temida por todo el mundo.
					
					Gracias a esta linea estrategica, defendemos con firmeza la soberania, dignidad y seguridad de la nacion frustrando paso a paso los incesantes chantajes nucleares y las maniobras de agresion de EE.UU. 
					
					Pero, Park Geun-hye no se da cuenta ni en lo minimo del gran significado de esa linea estrategica cuya justeza y vitalidad fueron comprobadas plenamente durante varios decenios pasados.
					
					Es por eso que maldice que "no se puede vivir junto con armas nucleares del Norte (de Corea)", "el Norte debe mostrar primero el movimiento de cambio de renunciar las armas nucleares" y "las armas nucleares no pueden asegurar la vida de los habitantes", y llego a acusar que "la linea sobre el desarrollo paralelo es un juego". 
					
					Si es una presidenta, debe sondear el proposito politico de la contraparte y conocer de su disposicion militar, antes de cambiarse de la falda y traje de civil por pantalones y el uniforme militar.
					
					Aunque pasaron pocos dias desde cuando Park ocupo Chongwadae, pero son incontables los hechos de que ella mostro su naturaleza conflictiva anti-RPDC.
					
					En esta oportunidad, nos vimos obligados a llamar la atencion a Park y otros gobernantes surcoreanos en actual mandato.
					
					Cuanto mas recurren a la locura conflictiva anti-RPDC soltando los disparates insultantes, tanto mas sufriran solo la verguenza y el arruinamiento. 
					
					Park y otros gobernantes surcoreanos deben ver correctamente la corriente de la epoca y parar los actos anacronicos. 
					
					Si resucitan por dentro la dictadura fascista de "Yusin", y por fuera, venden la dignidad nacional y se entregan a la confrontacion fratricida aferrandose a las fuerzas extranjeras, no podran evadir el destino tragico de los presidentes titeres anteriores. 
					
					Park Geun-hye debe recordar con seriedad por que el dictador de Yusin fue asesinado por el ataque de armas y por que su antecesor Lee Myung Bak vive como un cadaver vivo.
					
					La RPDC observara agudamente el movimiento posterior de Park y otros gobernantes actuales del Sur de Corea.
